metadata.Title: CVE-2020-9272 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: ProFTPD 1.3.7 has an out-of-bounds (OOB) read vulnerability in mod_cap via the cap_text.c cap_to_text function.

notes.Note: ebarretto> According to Debian: Debian does not build mod_cap and does not use the embedded libcap. Sourcewise fixed in 1.3.6c by updating to the lastest libcap.

criterions.comment: proftpd-dfsg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
